hackathon-description-text: Wearable technology such as Google Glass, smart watches, fitness bands, and even light-up shoes are very exciting pieces of fashion and tech. This 24-hour hackathon is open to college students from any U.S. university and will have a focus on combining fashion and tech and creating cool products and concepts within 24 hours. Cash prizes awarded to the winning teams. Let's build something, Kent State!
hackathon-rules:
:
The Blackstone LaunchPad program maintains the confidentiality of their clients.  All BLP staff (and student employees) are required to sign nondisclosure agreements (NDAs) that legally bind the staff member from discussing BLP clients' ventures without their consent.
We ask that event participants hold to the same spirit of this philosophy and refrain from sharing any proprietary information discussed outside of this event.  For those ventures developed out of the Fashion/Tech hackathon, it is up to the team members to determine what future roles team members will play in the venture.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=510 Hilltop Drive, Kent State University, Kent, OH 44240, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: What were you able to accomplish this weekend? (i.e. prototype)
